column1: Validation error, please use manual input.
column2: Validation error, please use manual input.

column1: Validation unavailable, please use manual input.
column2: Validation unavailable, please use manual input.

column1: Cannot connect to Postcode.nl API: Server is missing SSL (https) support for CURL.
column2: Cannot connect to Postcode.nl API: Server is missing SSL (https) support for CURL.

column1: Fill out your postcode and housenumber to auto-complete your address. You can also manually set your address information.
column2: Fill out your postcode and housenumber to auto-complete your address. You can also manually set your address information.

column1: Signal API response not understood, service unavailable.
column2: Signal API response not understood, service unavailable.

column1: A test connection could not be successfully completed.
column2: The test connection could not be successfully completed.

column1: A test connection to the API was successfully completed.
column2: A test connection to the API was successfully completed.

column1: Your server could not connect to the Postcode.nl server.
column2: Your server could not connect to the Postcode.nl server.

column1: Your servers' \cURL SSL CA bundle\" is missing or outdated. Further information:"
column2: "Your servers' \"cURL SSL CA bundle\" is missing or outdated. Further information:"

column1: How to update/fix your CA cert bundle
column2: How to update/fix your CA cert bundle

column1: cURL cannot read/access the CA cert file:
column2: cURL cannot read/access the CA cert file:

column1: Contact your hosting provider if problems persist.
column2: Contact your hosting provider if problems persist.

column1: The response from the Postcode.nl service could not be understood.
column2: The response from the Postcode.nl service could not be understood.

column1: The service might be temporarily unavailable, if problems persist, please contact info@postcode.nl."
column2: The service might be temporarily unavailable, if problems persist, please contact info@postcode.nl."

column1: Technical reason: No valid JSON was returned by the request.
column2: Technical reason: No valid JSON was returned by the request.

column1: Address API service has no problems, but the Signal API service reported an error.
column2: Address API service has no problems, but the Signal API service reported an error.\

column1: The Signal service might be temporarily unavailable, if problems persist, please contact info@postcode.nl."
column2: The Signal service might be temporarily unavailable, if problems persist, please contact info@postcode.nl."

column1: Technical reason: Received JSON data did not contain expected data.
column2: Technical reason: Received JSON data did not contain expected data.

column1: To get your Postcode.nl API key and secret, please register at Postcode.nl API.
column2: To get your Postcode.nl API key and secret, please register at Postcode.nl API.

column1: Dutch address validation via Postcode.nl Address API is available by default when you create an account.
column2: Dutch address validation via Postcode.nl Address API is available by default when you create an account.

column1: To use the Postcode.nl Signal API, sign up for the service during registration, or at your Postcode.nl API dashboard. Then, enable this option.
column2: To use the Postcode.nl Signal API, sign up for the service during registration, or at your Postcode.nl API dashboard. Then, enable this option.

column1: If you use the second 'street' field as a separate house-number field, enable this option.
column2: If you use the second 'street' field as a separate house-number field, enable this option.

column1: If you use the third 'street' field as a separate house-number addition field, enable this option. (requires 'Separate housenumber' option to be enabled too)
column2: If you use the third 'street' field as a separate house-number addition field, enable this option. (requires 'Separate housenumber' option to be enabled too)

column1:
This will consider 'post office box' (postbus) addresses invalid for all validated address fields.
(though still allowed if address is added with 'manual' checkbox)
column2:
This will consider 'post office box' (postbus) addresses invalid for all validated address fields.
(though still allowed if address is added with 'manual' checkbox)

column1:
For webshops with a more international audience, always show the country selection box.
Developer Note: If there are other fields next to the country selector, they will be disabled.
column2:
For webshops with a more international audience, always show the country selection box.
Developer Note: If there are other fields next to the country selector, they will be disabled.

column1: You can use this option if you encounter problems in the admin address validation, or want to allow all addresses in the admin.
column2: You can use this option if you encounter problems in the admin address validation, or want to allow all addresses in the admin.

column1:
By enabling this option, you will see what additional information the Postcode.nl API has to offer, every time your information is enriched.
(this is not recommended in production environments!)
column2:
By enabling this option, you will see what additional information the Postcode.nl API has to offer, every time your information is enriched.
(this is not recommended in production environments!)

column1:
Additional debug information used for trouble-shooting will be sent by the Postcode.nl API extension. Signal API will log to 'var/log/postcodenl-signal.log'.
(this is not recommended in production environments!)
column2:
Additional debug information used for trouble-shooting will be sent by the Postcode.nl API extension. Signal API will log to 'var/log/postcodenl-signal.log'.
